title: Country Development Finance Data
description: Methodology and flat files for IATI data
label: English
homepageLookingGuidanceAnalysis: Looking for the guidance and analysis dashboards? We've moved this content to the About section.

dataDashboards.label: Data Dashboards
dataDashboards.customDownloadText: Choose the columns to be included in your spreadsheet and select the filters to narrow your search. Download the custom set of data in Excel.
dataDashboards.dataSource: The source of this data is the organisations publishing data to IATI. The data is updated once per day to capture new or updated data published to the IATI Registry. Additional details can be found in the {methodology} section.
dataDashboards.dataSourceContact: For support or training, reach out to {emailContact}
dataDashboards.selectAtLeastOneColumn: You must select at least one column
dataDashboards.filtersText: Select filters to customise the visualisation.
dataDashboards.noResults: There are no results for your selected filters.
dataDashboards.selectSomeOptions: Select some options, and then click Run on the left.
dataDashboards.exactSearchTerm: Type an exact search term and press Enter.
dataDashboards.advancedSearchFilter: Type to search for name or description...

switchTransactionTypes.toAdvanced: Switch to advanced view: select transaction types
switchTransactionTypes.toSimple: Switch to simple view: select budget and/or spending

reportingOrganisationGroup.select: Select groups of reporting organisations for organisations that publish data under multiple reporting organisations.
reportingOrganisationGroup.label: Reporting Organisation Group

countries.label: Country / Region
countries.select: Select a country or region to explore the data.

providers.label: Reporting Organisation
providers.select: Select a reporting organisation to explore the data.

sectors.label: Sector
sectors.select: Select a sector to explore the data.

dataDashboards.spendSummaryChartText: This chart shows both budgets and spending for the previous three years, the current year, and the next three years. The resource flows and years/quarters filters have not been applied to this chart.

unavailableDrilldowns.calendar_year_and_quarter: Calendar Year and Quarter | Calendar Years and Quarters
